intro: Hymenocallis liriosme, commonly known as the white hurricane lily, is a member of the Amaryllidaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. The plant features showy, white, trumpet-shaped flowers that bloom in summer. Its leaves are broad and grass-like, often forming a basal rosette. The plant is adapted to grow in well-drained soils and is often cultivated for its ornamental value.
